snippet.title: Mario Artist: Talent Studio Promotional Video  - Japan ✔
snippet.description: 1999 Japanese promotional video for Mario Artist: Talent Studio, for the Nintendo 64DD. Showcasing the potential of it' Capture Cassette technology, which allows photographical mapping to use faces taken with a camera, to be used with the 64DD software.
